ygData.subject: Re: New patch Tuesday, who hates us at Verant?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Try Elemental and Purifying. They used to stack and were very handy in Mistmoore. -- Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, Jun 17/99, Beth Moursund <scrybsprite@...> wrote:
> From: Beth Moursund <scrybsprite@...>
>
> >Sigh. After the last late night patch, I discovered the recently
> >discussed stacking of magic resist songs no longer works. What's up with
>
> ??? I was stacking Guardian and Elemental Rhythms just this morning.
> Combined with what I was wearing, this gave me 80-plus magic resistance
> without drum, and a whopping 120 with drum. (The bastard Solusek Noble
> *still* managed to charm us sometimes, though!)
>

Try Elemental and Purifying. They used to stack and were very handy in
Mistmoore.


--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.

b+++ e* s-/+ n-(?) h++ f+g+ w+++ y*
